adviseScripts.text: Cadet,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I'll protect you no matter what happens.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You're the best.
Shouldn't it be the other way around?
If you're ever feeling threatened,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: be sure to let me know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Okay?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Oooh, that sounds pretty cool.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I appreciate you saying that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Moran.
Cadet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: What do you value most in life?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Loyalty.
Money.
Me as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: A life without loyalty is a fate worse than death.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Sure, money is important,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: but I think loyalty matters more.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: A merchant's fidelity is of paramount importance when sealing the deal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Moran about loyalty.
Sakura and Rosanna
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: haven't been answering my calls recently.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I must have called them a dozen times, and they haven't responded once.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Maybe they're busy.
Could they have blocked you?
I've considered that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: After all, they are busier than me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I was just paranoid that they had blocked me or something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You really think they'd do such a thing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: They threatened to block me if I kept spamming them with phone calls...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: But I didn't think they'd actually do it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I call Rosanna and Sakura myself to confirm.
I wish I had a signature gesture or something,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: whenever I'm extolling the virtues of loyalty.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Do you have any recommendations?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Try a fist bump.
Try lifting both arms in the air and cheering.
A fist bump?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure that wouldn't cause someone to get aggressive?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Okay, I like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: That should work nicely.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: All right, I'll do that next time I'm praising loyalty to the heavens.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to try it out with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: During our session, Moran and I try out some potential signature gestures for her.
Rosanna always accuses me of being ignorant.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You don't think that, do you, Cadet?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I'd say you're more innocent than ignorant.
No, you're smart as a whip.
Innocent?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Being too innocent is tantamount to being naïve...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Nevertheless, I'll take that as a compliment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You don't need to blow smoke up my behind, Cadet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I'd rather you told it to me straight.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Lying is the ultimate way to corrode trust.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Moran.
My heart races whenever I look at you, Cadet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sick, am I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You like me, don't you?
You might have chronic heart disease.
Sure, you're great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Cadet... I... I think I know why my heart races!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Of course I don't!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: ... But just in case, maybe I should go to the hospital for a physical.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Moran.
Jin asked me if I was going on a date today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever been on a date?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: We can go on one together after this session.
I'm going on one once our session is finished.
You and me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Th-that'd be great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: But where should we go? What should we do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: This'll be my first date...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You can leave early if you need to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: But... could I tag along?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Moran and I talk about dates.
Cadet,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: what do you usually do when you're sad?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Cry until the sadness disappears.
What makes you ask? Are you feeling sad?
Does crying help?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: ... But I don't want you to see me cry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Yeah...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: One of the Peony Association members got injured during a mission, pretty badly too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: So I'm feeling kind of down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I comfort Moran for a while.
Hey, Cadet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I brought you some peonies.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I thought they might look nice in your room.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: It'll be like having a piece of you in my room every day.
Peonies are my favorite flower.
Huh? I'm not sure I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Why should we have to be together every day?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Really?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: That's great.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I'm a big fan of peonies as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: After these wilt, I'll bring you some fresh ones.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Moran and I talk about peony flowers.
The Peony Association members have been on their best behavior as of late,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: so I want to do something special for them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Do you have suggestions?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Write each of them a handwritten letter.
Arrange a get-together for the squad.
Letters?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... I'll think about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: That means I'd have to write about a dozen of them, though...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: It would be nice for all of us to have a big meal together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: We could chow down on some good grub.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You should come as well, Cadet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Moran.
Cadet,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: when it comes to girls, do you have a type?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Someone who's cheerful.
Someone who's charming.
I prefer someone who's peppy and bubbly as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Being around people like that gives you a real energy boost.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Sounds like you and I are kindred spirits, Cadet!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Charming?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Would you say that
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I'm charming?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Moran about my ideal type of girl.
I'm late for my session with Moran.
As I enter the Commander's Room huffing and puffing, Moran doesn't seem to notice my presence.
Got something on your mind?
Oh, hi Cadet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I didn't hear you come in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: In fact, something has been bugging me, and I was hoping you could help me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Gah! You scared me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I didn't hear you come in. You should have announced your presence!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Now I forgot what I wanted to say...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Moran.
Cadet!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Loyalty! Loyalty! Loyalty!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: ... Loyalty.
Loyalty! Loyalty! Loyalty!
C'mon, louder!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Say it like you mean it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Yes! I knew you'd shout out with me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I feel so freakin' pumped right now!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Moran and I bellow out chants all day long.
Cadet,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I think you're the most beautiful person I've ever known.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Right back at you.
I get that a lot.
T-thanks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Oh my goodness, I didn't expect you to be so candid...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Is it just me, or is it hot in here? Could I crack open a window?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Haha, I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: But, you know... you didn't really respond to me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Moran and I talk about physical appearances.
I feel like all my money disappears the instant I close my eyes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: It's like I've got a hole in my wallet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Is there any way you could teach me how to save money?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I'm not really good at saving money myself.
How about I manage your money for you?
So I'm not the only one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: That's a minor relief at least.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Hmm? You?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Um... that's okay, thanks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Jin told me never to put your money in someone else's hands.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Moran and I further discuss ways to potentially save up money.
Cadet,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: what's your stance on white lies?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I think they're necessary.
I think they're just as bad as any other type of lie.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I'm against them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Even if they're uttered with good intentions, you're still earning someone's trust through deception.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I think so too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: A lie is a lie, and that's that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I talk about white lies with Moran.
Cadet!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: How do you like my sunglasses?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Very cool.
Where did you buy them? I want a pair.
Why do I feel like you're not being honest?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Your response sounds so rehearsed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Are you a big fan of sunglasses too?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: How about we go shopping sometime?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I talk about sunglasses with Moran.
I'm in the mood for a drink.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: What kind of alcohol do you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Cocktails that are on the sweet side.
Whiskey, neat.
Wow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I love a good cocktail.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: What do you say we get ourselves a round?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... whisky isn't really my favorite.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You seem to be able to hold your liquor well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: How do you feel about cocktails?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Moran and I talk about alcoholic beverages.
I always wonder what I would be
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: if I weren't the head of the Peony Association.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: A gang member.
A policewoman.
What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: There's nothing I despise more than hooligans!
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: So that's what you see me as?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: A police officer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: That's not bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: It seems you have a favorable impression of me, eh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: We think about other jobs that would suit Moran.
I want Jin to see a few of the scraps that we get into with other gangs,
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: but he always says his brain is his weapon of choice, not his brawn.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: You need to give him a proper reason to want to see a fight.
Take him by force.
It's just that he's way more eloquent than me. He'd probably talk circles around me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Could you help me come up with a good reason?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I'd rather not.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: I like to avoid all unnecessary conflict.
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Isn't there any other way?
adviseScripts.speaker: Moran

adviseScripts.text: Moran and I talk about Jin.
